headline: Mondelz International to Report Q2 2025 Financial Results on July 29, 2025
summary: CHICAGO, July 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mondelz International, Inc. (Nasdaq: MDLZ) will release its second quarter 2025 financial results on Tuesday, July 29, 2025 at 4:05 p.m. ET and will host a conference call at 5:00 p.m. ET that day.Investors and analysts may participate via phone by calling 800-225-9448 from the United States and 203-518-9708 from other locations. To ensure timely access, participants should dial in approximately 10 minutes before the call starts. A listen-only webcast

headline: Ferrara holding company in talks to buy French confectioner CPK
summary: US-based Ferrara Candy, affiliated to Ferrero, is looking to acquire the owner of brands including Carambar, Lutti, and Krema.
